Th\fs paper prese\bts a \bovel approach to query-focused mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b. As a \tood b\fased summary \fs expected to keep a bala\bce amo\b\t query releva\bce, co\bte\bt sal\fe\bce a\bd \f\bformat\fo\b d\fvers\fty, the approach f\frst makes use of both the co\bte\bt feature a\bd the relat\fo\bsh\fp feature to select a \bumber of se\bte\bces v\fa the cotra\f\b\f\b\t based sem\f-superv\fsed lear\b\f\b\t, wh\fch ca\b \fde\bt\ffy the query releva\bt se\bte\bces beyo\bd a s\f\b\tle po\f\bt of v\few. The\b the ra\bk\f\b\t al\tor\fthm based o\b Markov cha\f\b ra\bdom walks \fs employed o\b the releva\bt se\bte\bces by e\bcoura\t\f\b\t co\bte\bt sal\fe\bce a\bd \f\bformat\fo\b d\fvers\fty \f\b a u\b\ff\fed framework. The f\f\bal summary focus\f\b\t o\b the \f\bte\trat\fo\b of releva\bce, sal\fe\bce a\bd d\fvers\fty \fs created after several se\bte\bces w\fth the h\f\thest overall ra\bk\f\b\t scores are extracted. We performed exper\fme\bts o\b DUC2007 dataset a\bd the evaluat\fo\b results show that the proposed approach ca\b ach\feve s\f\t\b\ff\fca\bt \fmproveme\bt over sta\bdard basel\f\be approaches a\bd \ta\f\b comparable performa\bce to the state-of-the-art systems. sections.title: 1 Intr\bdu\tti\bn\f
paragraphs: Query-focused mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b has attracted much atte\bt\fo\b \f\b rece\bt years. D\fffere\bt from \te\ber\fc summar\fzat\fo\b, \ft a\fms to prov\fde more perso\bal\fzed \f\bformat\fo\b for a \t\fve\b query. By automat\fcally captur\f\b\t releva\bt a\bd sal\fe\bt co\bte\bt from a lar\te amou\bt of search\f\b\t results a\bd show\f\b\t them \f\b a co\bc\fse way, the sort of summar\fzat\fo\b ca\b a\fd people to qu\fckly access a\bd d\f\test the\fr \f\bterested \f\bformat\fo\b. It also prov\fdes a\b effect\fve mea\bs to d\fverse appl\fcat\fo\bs such as quest\fo\b a\bswer\f\b\t system, perso\bal\fzed \f\bformat\fo\b retr\feval, perso\bal\fzed \bews recomme\bder, etc. To date, the most \f\bflue\bt\fal a\b\bual evaluat\fo\b workshop for automat\fc summar\fzat\fo\b research \fs the Docume\bt U\bdersta\bd\f\b\t Co\bfere\bce (DUC or \bow TAC), wh\fch prov\fdes a lar\te-scale test be\bchmark as well as commo\b evaluat\fo\b procedures for researchers to share the\fr \fdeas a\bd exper\fe\bces. 190 23rd Pacific Asia Conference on Language, Information and Computation, pages 190–199

The cr\ft\fcal \fssues \f\b query-focused mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b are as follows: The f\frst o\be \fs that the \f\bformat\fo\b co\bta\f\bed \f\b the \te\berated summary should be h\f\thly related to the \t\fve\b query. The seco\bd \fssue \fs how to take sal\fe\bce a\bd d\fvers\fty \f\bto accou\bt whe\b select\f\b\t a batch of se\bte\bces or other textual u\b\fts as represe\btat\fves for a summary. As the allowed capac\fty \f\b a summary \fs usually l\fm\fted, \ft w\fll be \f\bappropr\fate to put all the \f\bformat\fve se\bte\bces from d\fffere\bt docume\bts \f\bto the summary for they may co\bvey the s\fm\flar mea\b\f\b\ts. The \f\btu\ft\fo\b beh\f\bd a \tood query-focused summary \fs to preserve the \f\bformat\fo\b b\fased to the query as much as poss\fble, a\bd rema\f\b the most represe\btat\fve a\bd sal\fe\bt \f\bformat\fo\b that have the least dupl\fcate co\bte\bts to the \f\bformat\fo\b selected prev\fously.

I\b th\fs study, we propose a \bovel se\bte\bce-based extract\fve approach. S\f\bce \ft \fs \bot e\bou\th to select releva\bt se\bte\bces from a s\f\b\tle po\f\bt of v\few a\bd \bo labeled releva\bt or \frreleva\bt se\bte\bces are ava\flable \f\b adva\bce, the proposed approach f\frst makes full use of the co-tra\f\b\f\b\t al\tor\fthm to \fde\bt\ffy the releva\bt se\bte\bces o\b two abu\bda\bt feature v\fews w\fth a small \bumber of pseudo-labeled se\bte\bces. The\b \ft employs a ra\bk\f\b\t al\tor\fthm to sort the releva\bt se\bte\bces a\bd choose a certa\f\b \bumber of represe\btat\fves w\fth h\f\thest co\bte\bt sal\fe\bce a\bd \f\bformat\fo\b d\fvers\fty for the f\f\bal summary. Exper\fme\btal results o\b DUC2007 ma\f\b task dataset show that the proposed approach s\f\t\b\ff\fca\btly outperforms the basel\f\be approaches a\bd ach\feves comparable performa\bce to the state-of-the-art systems.

The rema\f\bder of the paper \fs or\ta\b\fzed as follows. Sect\fo\b 2 d\fscusses related work. The proposed summar\fzat\fo\b approach \fs descr\fbed \f\b Sect\fo\b 3. The deta\fls of the exper\fme\btat\fo\b are show\b \f\b Sect\fo\b 4. Sect\fo\b 5 prese\bts our co\bclus\fo\b a\bd future work.

sections.title: 2 Related\fW\brk\f
paragraphs: Most of mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b methods ca\b be cate\tor\fzed \f\bto two ma\f\b parad\f\tms, \f.e. extract\fve a\bd abstract\fve summar\fzat\fo\b. Extract\fve summar\fzat\fo\b ofte\b d\frectly extracts \fmporta\bt se\bte\bces \f\b superv\fsed, u\bsuperv\fsed or sem\f-superv\fsed way based o\b the comb\f\bat\fo\b of a few \fmpl\fc\ft or expl\fc\ft features (Goldste\f\b et al., 2000; Radev et al., 2004), wh\fle abstract\fve summar\fzat\fo\b usually makes use of deep \batural la\b\tua\te u\bdersta\bd\f\b\t or \te\berat\fo\b tech\bolo\ty to fuse or reformulate \f\bformat\fo\b (K\b\f\tht a\bd Marcu, 2000). I\b th\fs paper, we focus o\b extract\fve summar\fzat\fo\b approach.

Compared to s\f\b\tle-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b, \ft \fs more l\fkely for mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b to have repet\ft\fve co\bte\bts a\bd d\fverse subtop\fcs across docume\bts, so max\fm\fz\f\b\t co\bte\bt sal\fe\bce a\bd m\f\b\fm\fz\f\b\t co\bte\bt redu\bda\bcy has bee\b reco\t\b\fzed as o\be of the major d\fff\fcult\fes. Ma\by methods have bee\b proposed to ach\feve th\fs \toal. Max\fmum mar\t\f\bal releva\bce (MMR) (Carbo\bell a\bd Goldste\f\b, 1998), GRASSHOPPER ra\bk\f\b\t (Zhu et al., 2007), d\fvers\fty pe\balty (Zha\b\t et al., 2005) a\bd m\fxture models (Zha\b\t et al., 2002) are commo\bly used approaches \f\bcorporat\f\b\t \f\bformat\fo\b sal\fe\bce a\bd d\fvers\fty \f\bto the ra\bk\f\b\t process. Amo\b\t these approaches, GRASSHOPPER ra\bk\f\b\t tr\fes to e\bcoura\te the bala\bce of sal\fe\bce a\bd d\fvers\fty \f\b a u\b\ff\fed framework, wh\fle other approaches deal w\fth them separately.

I\bsp\fred by Pa\teRa\bk a\bd HITS al\tor\fthm, much focus has bee\b put o\b adopt\f\b\t \traph-based ra\bk\f\b\t al\tor\fthm l\fke LexRa\bk (Erka\b a\bd Radev, 2004) a\bd TextRa\bk (M\fhalcea a\bd Tarau, 2004) to mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b. These al\tor\fthms \te\berally employ the \tlobal \f\bformat\fo\b descr\fbed by a passa\te aff\f\b\fty \traph a\bd recurs\fvely calculate each passa\te’s s\f\t\b\ff\fca\bce based o\b l\f\bk structure a\balys\fs, stab\fl\fty-based ra\bdom walk, \tlobal co\bs\fste\bcy or smooth\bess-based label propa\tat\fo\b o\b the \traph. Top\fc-se\bs\ft\fve LexRa\bk (Havel\fwala, 2003) exte\bded the trad\ft\fo\bal LexRa\bk al\tor\fthm by \f\bte\trat\f\b\t the s\fm\flar\fty betwee\b se\bte\bces a\bd the \t\fve\b query. Wa\b et al. (2007) adopted a ma\b\ffold-ra\bk\f\b\t al\tor\fthm to ra\bk se\bte\bces by co\bs\fder\f\b\t \tlobal \f\bformat\fo\b a\bd emphas\fz\f\b\t the h\f\th b\fased \f\bformat\fo\b r\fch\bess \f\b a score propa\tat\fo\b process.

Rece\btly co-tra\f\b\f\b\t al\tor\fthm has bee\b successfully used \f\b ma\by \batural la\b\tua\te process\f\b\t appl\fcat\fo\bs (Muller et al., 2002; Sarkar, 2001). Wo\b\t et al. (2008) appl\fed co-191 tra\f\b\f\b\t al\tor\fthm to \te\ber\fc mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b, wh\fch tra\f\bs two d\fffere\bt class\ff\fers o\b the same feature space to evaluate the \fmporta\bce of a se\bte\bce a\bd \beeds a few ma\bually labeled examples as tra\f\b\f\b\t data. However, there \fs l\fttle research \f\b apply\f\b\t cotra\f\b\f\b\t based lear\b\f\b\t al\tor\fthm to query-focused mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b espec\fally whe\b ma\bually labeled \f\bformat\fo\b \fs abse\bt. I\b our approach, the major po\f\bt of co\bcer\b \fs how to employ the co-tra\f\b\f\b\t al\tor\fthm to support better choos\f\b\t query releva\bt se\bte\bces from two d\fffere\bt but abu\bda\bt feature v\fews, wh\fch ca\b \f\bcorporate mult\f-d\fme\bs\fo\bal compleme\btary \f\bformat\fo\b to class\ffy each se\bte\bce by levera\t\f\b\t both the \f\bd\fv\fdual \f\bformat\fo\b \f\b each se\bte\bce a\bd the relat\fo\bsh\fp \f\bformat\fo\b amo\b\t se\bte\bces.

sections.title: 3 The\fPr\bp\bsed\fAppr\ba\th\f\f 3.1 Overview\f
paragraphs: I\b order to \te\berate a b\fased summary w\fth \tood character\fst\fcs of releva\bce, sal\fe\bce a\bd d\fvers\fty, we f\frst \f\bvest\f\tate the effect\fve\bess of comb\f\b\f\b\t two k\f\bds of d\fffere\bt features \f\b a sem\f-superv\fsed lear\b\f\b\t process to dec\fde wh\fch se\bte\bces are releva\bt to the query. After that, a se\bte\bce ra\bk\f\b\t al\tor\fthm w\fth the emphas\fs o\b sal\fe\bce a\bd d\fvers\fty \fs employed o\b these releva\bt se\bte\bces so as to e\bsure the top-ra\bked se\bte\bces such character\fst\fcs.

The proposed approach ma\f\bly co\bs\fsts of two steps. The f\frst step \fs to class\ffy all the se\bte\bces \f\b a docume\bt set u\bder two v\few sett\f\b\ts a\bd select a \bumber of se\bte\bces closely related to the query v\fa the co-tra\f\b\f\b\t based lear\b\f\b\t al\tor\fthm (Blum a\bd M\ftchell, 1998). The seco\bd step \fs to ra\bk all the selected se\bte\bces v\fa the Markov cha\f\b ra\bdom walks (Zhu et al., 2007) a\bd take the top o\bes to create the f\f\bal summary, wh\fch takes \f\bto accou\bt co\bte\bt sal\fe\bce a\bd \f\bformat\fo\b d\fvers\fty \f\b a u\b\ff\fed framework.

sections.title: 3.2 C\b-training\fBased\fLearning\ff\br\fthe\fSele\tti\bn\f\bf\fQuery\fRelevant\fSenten\tes\f\f
paragraphs: I\b query-focused mult\f-docume\bt summar\fzat\fo\b, a user usually poses a query reflect\f\b\t h\fs perso\bal\fzed requ\freme\bt a\bd asks the summar\fzer to a\bswer the query \f\b a co\bc\fse way. So how to f\f\bd the releva\bt se\bte\bces becomes the pr\fmary problem. Sem\f-superv\fsed lear\b\f\b\t \fs a \batural approach for th\fs problem where all the se\bte\bces \f\b a docume\bt set are requ\fred to be class\ff\fed \f\bto pos\ft\fve se\bte\bces (\f.e. query releva\bt se\bte\bces) a\bd \be\tat\fve se\bte\bces (\f.e. query \frreleva\bt se\bte\bces), but o\bly o\be pos\ft\fve labeled se\bte\bce (\f.e. the query) \fs ava\flable.

Co-tra\f\b\f\b\t \fs a class\fc sem\f-superv\fsed lear\b\f\b\t al\tor\fthm that ca\b take adva\bta\te of u\blabeled data to boost lear\b\f\b\t performa\bce. Trad\ft\fo\bal co-tra\f\b\f\b\t works u\bder a two-v\few sett\f\b\t a\bd assumes that each example should be descr\fbed by two d\fffere\bt a\bd co\bd\ft\fo\bally \f\bdepe\bde\bt feature sets. Rece\bt research has demo\bstrated that the stro\b\t assumpt\fo\b of \f\bdepe\bde\bce betwee\b two v\fews \fs \bot \becessary. However co-tra\f\b\f\b\t ca\b \bot be effect\fvely performed whe\b there \fs o\bly o\be labeled example, so our approach tr\fes to choose a small \bumber of se\bte\bces as pseudo labeled se\bte\bces. For pseudo releva\bt se\bte\bces, we determ\f\be a few se\bte\bces w\fth the h\f\thest s\fm\flar\fty to the query; for pseudo \frreleva\bt o\bes, we p\fck a few se\bte\bces w\fth the lowest s\fm\flar\fty to the query. I\b th\fs paper, we focus o\b how to make use of two suff\fc\fe\bt features \f\b the co-tra\f\b\f\b\t process to class\ffy the se\bte\bces a\bd automat\fcally \f\bfer the labels for the u\blabeled se\bte\bces.

G\fve\b a set of se\bte\bces S={s0, s1,...,s\b-1}. Here s0 de\botes the \t\fve\b query that ca\b be treated as a pseudo-se\bte\bce, a\bd the rest de\botes all the se\bte\bces \f\b the docume\bts to be summar\fzed. Let X a\bd Y de\bote two d\fffere\bt se\bte\bce features \f\bvest\f\tated \f\b our approach. Here X represe\bts co\bte\bt feature that uses co\bte\bt bear\f\b\t terms to descr\fbe a se\bte\bce, a\bd Y \fs relat\fo\bsh\fp feature that represe\bts a se\bte\bce by \fts pa\fr-w\fse s\fm\flar\fty w\fth other se\bte\bces. sections.title: 3.3 Rand\bm\f Walks\f Based\f Ranking\f f\br\f the\f Sele\tti\bn\f \bf\f Salient\f and\f Diverse\f Senten\tes\f
paragraphs: The GRASSHOPPER ra\bk\f\b\t al\tor\fthm \fs a \te\beral-purpose ra\bk\f\b\t method, wh\fch focuses o\b \f\bformat\fo\b d\fvers\fty dur\f\b\t the ra\bk\f\b\t process.
